data.title: If you are over 40 and want to win an Olympic medal, no matter in what sport, what should you do?
data.meta_description:
Answer (1 of 6): I don't think people can maintain the required fitness. So they should look for the games that require much lesser fitness then the rest;

1. Archery
2. Shooting
These are the only two games that are possible if you have no prior experience in any sports. The major reason as I ha...
